meanings.sent1: She kept misadjusting the chair height, making it uncomfortable to sit.
meanings.sent2: He realized he was misadjusting the thermostat, causing the room to be too hot.
meanings.sent3: The robot kept misadjusting its sensors, leading to comical errors in navigation.
meanings.sent4: Her constant misadjusting of the radio dial made finding a clear station impossible.
meanings.sent5: The mechanic warned against misadjusting the engine timing, as it could cause serious damage.

meanings.sent1: The student was misadjusting the microscope focus, resulting in blurry images.
meanings.sent2: By misadjusting the telescope, he missed seeing the comet in the night sky.
meanings.sent3: Misadjusting the recipe measurements turned the cake into a strange culinary experiment.
meanings.sent4: The pilot risked misadjusting the altitude, endangering the safety of the flight.
meanings.sent5: Misadjusting the guitar strings made it impossible to play a clear tune.
